DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics PF-04447943 single multiple-dose administration healthy young adult elderly Japanese subject , respectively .
DOC.brief_title: Study Of Single Ascending And Multiple Doses Of PF-04447943 In Japanese Subjects .
DOC.criteria: For young cohort , healthy male and/or female Japanese nonchild bear potential age 18 55 year , inclusive . For elderly cohort , healthy male and/or female Japanese nonchild bear potential age 65 85 year , inclusive . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 , total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Pregnant nursing woman ; woman childbearing potential . Males unwilling abstain sexual intercourse use condom childbearing potential woman duration study .
